useCase.name: Update Request Status
useCase.description: Allows the User to update the status of a request.

preconditions.precondition: The User is logged in and has the necessary permissions.

successEndConditions.condition: The request status is successfully updated in the database.

failureEndConditions.condition: An error occurs while updating the request status.

useCase.trigger: User selects a request ID and provides a status (Accept/Reject).

mainSequence.step: User selects request ID and provides status (Accept/Reject).
RequestController executes SELECT query to fetch request details.
RequestController executes UPDATE queries for requests and books (if accepted).
ConsoleUI shows success or failure message.
